alert.note: Alert for St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 6:11PM CDT until April 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central St. Louis County in east central Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 610 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eureka, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...At 612 PM, trained weather spotters reported half dollar sized hail in Ballwin, Missouri. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Chesterfield, Wildwood, University City, Ballwin, Kirkwood, Maryland Heights, Webster Groves, Manchester, Creve Coeur, Overland, Clayton, St. Ann, Crestwood, Bridgeton, Town and Country, Eureka, Ellisville, Richmond Heights, Ladue, and Sunset Hills. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 264 and 277. This also includes Route 66 State Park and Castlewood State Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Illinois...and east central Missouri.
